website_summaries.verdict: An alcohol-free chew deterrent with a potent bitter flavor that dogs can't stand.
pros: 1-year money-back guarantee for added buying confidence
cons: Determined dogs may still chew in the absence of proper training techniques

customer_reviews.title: Puppy tested and parent approved
customer_reviews.text: My puppy goes from 0 to 500 in seconds and her favorite thing is to chew anything she can get a hold of. But this product after a lot of research will not disappoint it is saving the legs of my table and chairs. Will buy again for sure
customer_reviews.author: Mecca

customer_reviews.title: DOES  NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: ITEM DID NOT WORK. My puppy chewed my fingers, legs til they where bleeding all day. The puppy As shown. The product did not deter him in anyway or anywhere it was applied. I was hoping that this product would work. My vet told me to buy "sour apple" . After reading that the product was the most powerful bitter, anti-chew spray. I thought the product would work better than "sour apple". I was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Piermonster

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product helped my Staffy/Lab mix Scrappy with his chewing on things. Mainly shoes his favorite type of chew toy. I highly recommend this product for dogs who are problem chewers.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Heiser

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't do what it claims to do.
customer_reviews.text: I've sprayed various items around my house so my puppy wouldn't chew, so just a few pumps, others a soaking. Nothing worked, she still goes after the items with a vengence.
customer_reviews.author: P. Battaglia

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work I sprayed it once on my sandal didn't work sprayed it again and he still kept bitting it he even started bitting on the spray bottle
customer_reviews.author: katherine

customer_reviews.title: Look at my attached photo and see for yourself
customer_reviews.text: My dog thought this product tasted even better than the furniture alone... see photo attached.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for my dog
customer_reviews.text: I used the spray on the things my dog likes to chew on the most, and tried to apply the spray as many times as possible and it doesn't stop him from gnawing on stuff. For instance he likes to chew the corner of a wooden futon, so I sprayed a hefty amount on the futon right as he is chewing on it, and he just happily goes back to chewing on it.
customer_reviews.author: Wes Couch

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for my  9 week german shepard
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of all the good reviews but after receiving it and trying it my dog likes it more then anything. I even tried spraying it in her mouth when she would bite but she would just take the bottle and try to eat it I do not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really?? Who reviewed this??
customer_reviews.text: This does NOT work at all!! I have to wonder WHO teviewed it above a 1 star. It absolutely does nothing. Our puppy bit everything we sprayed. With bitter apple he bit nothing we sprayed. We just wanted to try NO alchol version.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: My dog licked it and loved it :(
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is so bad and unworthy of your money. I sprayed this on a corner that my puppy loves to chew and he actually licked it up as if it was his favorite food.
customer_reviews.author: USMC Veteran

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I never even heard of a spray like this 'til I was browsing on Amazon shopping for my new pups training pads and such. I am so grateful I purchased this!! This is a life saver when you're training a new puppy plus you have a big family with little kids that like to leave things out everywhere. We have to spray some items more than once a day, but she gets it and then she will stick with her toys. Definitely worth the buy and the customer service couldn't be any more better! They help you with training, answer any questions and check up on how it's going. So satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: khrysten

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Sprayed on the corners of all of my rugs. My dog who is a notorious rug chewing hasn't touched any of them since. Doesn't stain the rugs or smell.
customer_reviews.author: Applebreze

customer_reviews.title: MY TWO PUPS HATE IT, BUT I LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have two puppies, and have tried many anti chew sprays, including homemade, vinegar and Vick's rub, which was suggested by one breeder. Absolutely NOTHING compares to PRO Anti Chew Spray for Dogs and Puppies. Simply follow the instructions, and it deters puppies from chewing, anywhere in the house, and I found it works outside. I'm so impressed with it, I've purchased a second bottle. Also, a little goes a long way I ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT, BUT THE PUPS DON'T!
customer_reviews.author: Patty K.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This bottle is very effective. It did not 100% prevent my dog from chewing on the wall corners, but it definitely helped a lot. She rarely bites the wall now but I do have to keep spraying it on the wall regularly. I do recommend this to anyone with a teething puppy, but make sure you spray it thoroughly and regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Harper

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Just got a new puppy, and he definitely doesn't like the taste of this stuff. I tried it out of curiosity and I definitely don't like it either. I love that it is safe for wood since we have a lot of nice wood furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Corrin

customer_reviews.title: I am SHOCKED at how quickly this product worked! ...
customer_reviews.text: I am SHOCKED at how quickly this product worked!!! I have a pit mix that has been chewing on out walls and trim in our kitchen even though she has TONS of bones and toys to play with. I sprayed this on the trim and walls while she wasn't in the room only ONE TIME and she has stayed away from them ever since!! This was a last resort try because I swear we had tried EVERYTHING. I still can't believe we only had to use it once. I have re-sprayed the walls once since then just to be save and my dog now has no interest!! Thank you thank you thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this to all dog owners - it works
customer_reviews.text: Our dog was of the impression that some oak molding in our home was her personal chew toy. I tried Bitter Apple and other home remedies that all failed. I saw the PRO Anti Chew Spray and read the comments and figured I'd give it a try. I was surprised to see that the product worked as promised and our dog has not touched the molding since I began using the product as directed. I highly recommend this to all dog owners - it works!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Dog hates it, but it doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: My 10 week old Australian Shepherd puppy chews on everything! Except her toys, of course. I purchased this spray to try to deter her from chewing on things she shouldn't. It sort of worked. She definitely doesn't like the taste of it, and once she associated the taste with the smell, she didn't like the smell either. However, the scent and taste seem to wear off rather quickly. I found myself having to spray everything multiple times a day. Also, at first the scent was fairly pleasant, but after smelling it all the time, it became a little nauseating. If the scent was a little better and it lasted longer then I would have given 4, maybe even 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Powell

customer_reviews.title: My dog literally licked it right off
customer_reviews.text: I think my dog liked it. I sprayed my shoes down with it before bed because he lives stealing my shoes at night and cheering them. As soon as I sprayed my shoes he started licking it off before it even had a chance to dry. If anything it made him want them more
customer_reviews.author: Katie84

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I have a 90 pound puppy that has chewed everything from cushions to coffee tables to porch steps. I sprayed this on all his favorites chew spots and the only issue is he found new ones without the spray! I’ve learned to spray EVERYTHING now before we leave him alone in the house. Smells strong to me when I first spray it, but when we come back home I can’t smell it at all, even on the couch cushions I sprayed. You do need to respray as it will wear off. I only leave him alone once or twice a week, but I respray each time and have had great results!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hall

customer_reviews.title: My Shih Tzu loves this product, they should make it in a treat.
customer_reviews.text: This anti chew spray may work for some dogs, but my Shih Tzu pretty much laughed at my face when I first used this spray. I saw she was chewing my crocs, so I decided to spray them completely with this product. Once I placed my crocs back on the floor, she started licking them all around until there seemed to be no product left on the crocs so she started chewing on them again. Then we tried some of our furniture legs and basically the same result. So we simply gave up on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Vélez

customer_reviews.title: Works, when used as described below
customer_reviews.text: This works pretty well for my 3mo puppy. She knows when she even sees the bottle to stop chewing on whatever (chair legs, sofa). Only thing is, it only works for me when freshly sprayed/wet. Once dry, she goes back to try again. So don’t spray this all over, use it targeted when she actually starts to chew on something - the dog will hate the taste and smell and stop.
customer_reviews.author: melissa_in_ny

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work at all
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work at all. Bought this product so my dog didn't chew the base moulding around the door in our new home. Was trying to find a way to train her not to chew when we are not home. Within a week it was all chewed up. And i put plenty of this on the area. It choked us and left a terrible taste on our mouths while spraying it, but didnt even phase the dog.
customer_reviews.author: stevo

customer_reviews.title: Only works if you use it a lot for a heavy chewer
customer_reviews.text: I have a pup that is almost a year old now. She is a bully/border mix. My pup chews a lot so I got this for her hoping to keep her from chewing her bed, collar, leash and more. Tally does not chew furniture so I got lucky there. This stuff you must wash your hands after use or you will get it on your face and your cloths. It has a stinky smell so you need to spray it on your pets item outside. Then bring the item into the house for your pets use. Our dog became accustomed to the smell. That did not help matters for us. I would not purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for puppy, whole room tastes like pepper spray
customer_reviews.text: I've got a Great Dane puppy who loves chewing on wood-- baseboards, door frames, doors, etc. Every time I've sprayed this places, both indoors and outdoors, you have to vacate the area as it will burn your throat/eyes. If you've ever been in a room where someone has sprayed pepper spray, it's a similar (though more mild) sensation. That wouldn't bother me as much if it worked, but it was completely ineffective at keeping my pup from chewing. No matter how much I put on, she has zero issue with the spray and continues to eat the corners of my doors with reckless abandon.
customer_reviews.author: Castille

customer_reviews.title: An empty bottle works for training
customer_reviews.text: My pup (now 1.5 year old) has been chewing through everything, she's got tons of toys but prefers to chew on wood of my parents' expensive furniture. I bought this and I tasted it before using, yes it is bitter. She hates it and will not chew on furniture I sprayed it on. It wears off pretty fast but once she associated the bitterness to the strong lemongrass scent she runs away when she sees the bottle is coming out so I don't have to even spray it anymore. An empty bottle now does the trick to teach her what is chewable and what is not!
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: My dog loved the taste. Didn’t work at all.
customer_reviews.text: My dog had been chewing on my vertical blinds. Normally he chews one or two blinds at a time when he does. I tried this product. I sprayed new vertical blind slats with this product when I put them up. I sprayed them heavily. Within 24 my dog shredded every single blind I sprayed with “Stop the Chew”. I think he liked it a lot which was, in it self, a problem. It didn’t work at all for what I needed it for. Yes I followed the directions. Yes I read the packaging. No it didn’t work. Not even a little bit. Maybe I’ll spray his toys next to encourage him to chew on those.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog is not effected by this stuff. BUT -
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is insanely bitter. I sprayed it on my carpet, and I could taste it from it wafting through the air into my nose. I could assume that most dogs would NOT be a fan of this stuff. Unfortunately that’s not the case for my 4 month old corgi, he doesn’t care - he continues to chew things even if they’re doused with this stuff. That being said I’m NOT going to give this product a bad review, all dogs are different. Just because my dog isn’t effected by this bitter flavor, doesn’t mean it’s not a strong bitter spray.
customer_reviews.author: Nikita B.

customer_reviews.title: Reapply often -- It worked for my puppy!
customer_reviews.text: Works for my puppy but had to be reapplied often! I have a Westie puppy who loves shoe laces. It took about a week and several sprays per day to "cure" him. He hated the taste immediately but persisted due to his terrier stubbornness. It been a month now and he ignores my hiking boots and running shoes. Has a pleasant smell and freshened up my running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: K. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good for Dogs
customer_reviews.text: Soooooo..... my dog hates it, which is great, she’s finally stopped chewing on the stairs, but um.... my rabbit loves it 😬 Oh well, we do what we can haha So if you own a dog, this works great! Otherwise... hard to say... Ps. WASH YOUR HANDS after spraying. This stuff sticks and it is NASTY. I just rinsed my hands after spraying it instead of fully washing, and oh my gosh, the sandwich I had for lunch afterwards tasted like DEATH.
customer_reviews.author: Wagostino

customer_reviews.title: It's working to stop pup chewing
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is alcohol free, as opposed to another product I was using. This has stopped my pup instantly from chewing whatever is her latest thing to gnaw on. I put it on my pants legs, shoe laces, bottoms of my upholstery, my bed quilt edge, the corners of my wood coffee table. Absolutely no damage to any of these and more from the spray.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Kebrdle

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I have found to stop our dogs from chewing up furniture
customer_reviews.text: We bought non-chew dog beds to stop our 3 big dogs from chewing up their beds/blankets. They still chewed them for a while. Then they started chewing up the furniture. We purchased this product and spray the edges of the beds and the furniture where they were chewing each night at bedtime. Now they do not chew the beds or the furniture. It has a pleasant smell and works! We even sprayed it on a tree by our pond that a beaver was chewing. We sprayed the spot with paint and then Emmy's Best PRO Anti Chew spray. It worked!
customer_reviews.author: ALAN

customer_reviews.title: Worst "Anti-Chew" Spray Ever
customer_reviews.text: Not only does this not work, it actually made the puppies chew MORE! It seemed to attract them. I don't understand it. They seemed to dislike the taste at first, but then they actually liked it and would chew things BECAUSE it had been sprayed with this product. We tested it for weeks, spraying items that the puppies had never payed attention to it chewedd before. After being sprayed, the puppies would BE DRAWN TO THOSE ITEMS AND BETIM CHEWING THEM!! It is very frustrating, and I don't understand why this would be marketed as anti chewing if it actually encourages chewing.
customer_reviews.author: F. Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I was having issues with my puppy chewing up stuff while I was at work and someone suggested this stuff. I must say that this stuff really works! Just a couple sprays on the things you things your dog might chew and you won't come home to it chewed up. It doesn't have a terrible smell of leave a sticky film on the stuff you spray also. You get a pretty good amount also since you only have to use a couple sprays per item.
customer_reviews.author: Yusuf421

customer_reviews.title: Didn't seem effective.
customer_reviews.text: It was more effective against me as I was applying it and getting collaterally misted. It didn't slow down either of our dogs from chewing on their beds or a licking wound that one of my dogs has and it was being liberally applied. I would not buy this again. EDIT I will say they have great customer service. They reached out right away after I left my feedback. I'm writing this late as I hadn't gotten around to modifying my review earlier. I respect companies that step up when someone isn't satisfied with their product. Maybe it just wasn't effective for our dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob D Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Well it made me dry heave
customer_reviews.text: So the smell isn’t god awful but I had to spray down my entire pet ramp all the wood bc my new puppy absolutely loves to chew on it. This means there is a lot of spraying. So, natural, some got in my mouth. By the end I could barely hold back. I had to run to the bathroom and proceeded to dry heave several times. So, not sure yet about the dog but it certainly works for humans.
customer_reviews.author: Undomesticatedwife

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work for my Coon dog
customer_reviews.text: I read several good reviews of this spray that it worked wonders for owners. I guess my dog is an exception, if anything it encourages more chewing. I have a treeing walker coonhound so he has a nose like a blood hound. So, I sprayed our water house in our backyard because he’s chewed off about 15 feet in total. When I sprayed it on he went nuts and started running around the backyard like I was upsetting him. So I thought I was in the clear with this stuff, I was very wrong. He ended up chewing off another 5 feet of hose 🙄 maybe it’s just my dog it doesn’t work for, idk 🤷🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 very large dogs that love to chew on the couches. I have tried multiple sprays and non of them worked. This is the first one that actually works. I have 2 couches that look amazing and they have not chewed on them once. Love this product!!! Will be purchasing again. We have to be careful because if too much of it gets into the air it does leave a nasty taste in your mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Marie

customer_reviews.title: Best anti-chew spray
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST anti-chew spray I have used so far and I've tried a lot of them. Careful of inhaling the spray yourself when using it because man does it taste bad! Everything we've used it on (couch, pillows, home items) our dog has not touched. So thankful for this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B.

customer_reviews.title: It is certainly bitter
customer_reviews.text: My adopted one year old lab likes chewing electrical cables. She seems to have stopped. Be careful when spraying. If you get any on your hands and eat or drink, you will discover it is as bitter as advertised. Hard to wash off, which is probably a good thing. You might want to wear gloves when spraying it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Christopher Kent

customer_reviews.title: More bitter than my ex mother in law!!
customer_reviews.text: Wooooweee! This stuff works wonders let me tell y’all! I spray this stuff on my feet and it got in my mouth. It is somehow just as bitter as my ex mother in law! Just like her I couldn’t get rid of the nastieness she left me with. I had to grab my husbands mellow yellow drink and swish it around and even that didn’t work. Just made it worse just like everytime that lady opened her mouth. Needless to say this stuff works wonders it doesn’t smell nasty but it sure tastes DISGUSTING. My puppy hates it so I am satisfied. No more chewing my shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Maddie Kelley

customer_reviews.title: I knew right away this product would work!
customer_reviews.text: My new puppy bites and chews on everything! So right away, I started looking for a product that could help. As soon as I sprayed this on the coffee table my grandfather made (and that I refinished), the puppy took one sniff and walked away! Of course, it will take some time to completely break him of the chewing...he's only seven weeks old. But I'm very hopeful that, by following the training program, I'll be successful!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Halteman

customer_reviews.title: Great for puppies!!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for a puppy! My best friends dog is 1 and she has gotten into so much trouble eating and chewing stuff she shouldn’t. I got this for her and she sprayed it on stuff in her room and her dog stopped wanting to chew things as much. I don’t know it’s the smell or what but it works! Hopefully we can get her to stop chewing all together. I highly recommend getting this sooner rather than later. Better to cut the habits at an early stage.
customer_reviews.author: Lidia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for when my friends come over with their dogs
customer_reviews.text: Emmy's Best Anti Chew Spray is a powerful bitter taste that stops dogs from chewing, biting, and licking your personal items. When my friends would come over with their dogs they always ended up chewing something of mine. So I ordered this product based on the reviews it got. I am very impressed at how quickly this product worked. I have a lot of electronics, and i was spending a lot of money buying new cords all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hill

customer_reviews.title: With 3 dogs one of them is bound to be pretty stubborn
customer_reviews.text: About a month ago 2 out of 3 of my dogs decided it would be a good idea to start chewing and destroying my couch. After three days of using this product the destruction has pretty much stopped. The only reason I gave this a 4/5 star review is because one of them still finds a spot in that area that I may have missed with the spray to chew on. I just wish it would completely deter them from that area.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Useless as a cup of piss....
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is useless as a cup of piss. Because at least with a cup of piss you can get results out of. Apparently the flavor is very good because my dogs just lick it up and whatever I put on they still chewed on so I want to think this company for all the false good reviews because now my $4000 pool table with the leather pockets are no more.....STAY AWAY FROM THIS PRODUCT !!!
customer_reviews.author: shawn armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I have a one-year-old dog who was chewing the couch. Applying this twice a day every other day or so keeps him from chewing it. He was also peeing on his brother dogs crate. After spraying this on he doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product. I read multiple reviews before purchasing so I know this product works for other dogs, but it does not phase mine at all. Does not stop my dog from chewing in the least bit. Additionally, the smell is so strong that I have to leave the room after using the product. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had six golden retriever puppies over the years. First five all chewed on furniture. With our newest pup, the first couple days we sprayed anything he took an interest in. We’ve had him five weeks now and have had NO CHEWED FURNITURE! Will absolutely have this for any future pups, and give it as a present for friends who get a new puppy or dog.
customer_reviews.author: P and A

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I used it on the doggie door & plastic flap, so far so good, Suri is a Akita, and she loves to chew on the doogie door flap. She must have tried it, and either didn’t like the smell or taste. Cody is a German Shepherd he loves to chew on wood, he hasn’t touched it since I sprayed the baseboards.
customer_reviews.author: Suri

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 month old Siberian husky puppy. Used it for 3 days everytime she tried to bite or chew things. Now all we have to do is pick up the bottle and she turns the other way. Totally recommend this product. And the customer service is top notch. They send follow up emails and give you training instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My dog was chewing on sofa pillows. This spray has really helped curb that. He hates the taste and is able to recognize its scent (the smell is definitely there but not super strong) and avoids anything I spray. The spray lasts a few days before I end up reapplying and doesn’t leave any stain or residue on my things.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Smith

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK FOR RABBITS
customer_reviews.text: I know it doesn't say it's for rabbits, but just know, if you are trying to buy this for rabbit chewing, it doesn't work (at least my rabbit isn't being deterred in the slightest) Maybe it's just her, because I can confirm, getting this on my fingers, and just slightly tasting it is raunchy (similar to nail biting polish if you are familiar), and can imagine that most animals would be deterred from chewing anything covered in this. It also leaves a white shadow when drying which will build up if not wiped down before re-application.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Worked for our dog.
customer_reviews.text: We have a 5 month old German Shepherd that LIKES to chew. One spray of this stuff on whatever we don't want her to chew on, and she doesn't touch it again! Wires, chair legs, corners of cabinets, - it seems to work on everything. Impressed. Every dog is different - but it worked for ours!
customer_reviews.author: Paintball Mike

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I have two puppies that chew on everything. I sprayed these and no more chewing! NOTE: I would spray the carpet, leashes, ect about three times a day to keep them away. eventually they stopped and now i only do it once a day for good measure. It is super strong and you can taste it in your own mouth when you spray it, but it goes away after awhile and totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kendyl Pollard

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: my dog has destroyed 3 crates over the years, he chews and yanks on the doors bending the metal, when we bought a new crate this time around I bought Emmys stop chew and so far only a little bit of chewing. I spray the crate door every time he goes in there. If he wants to destroy another crate he's going to have a bitter tongue while doing it
customer_reviews.author: Sean P

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t seem to deter as well as the other spray
customer_reviews.text: It works... most of the time. It smells nice, but it is so bitter that I can taste it if a little mist gets in the air. I figured that my dog would hate it, but I have to use a ton of this stuff to keep him from biting my socks as I walk. He still tries a few times. It seems to really burn his eyes if he is anywhere nearby when I spray it. I’ll stick with the other spray.
customer_reviews.author: Christo

customer_reviews.title: He's leaving the carpet alone!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bitter apple spray to keep my one year old Morkie from chewing up a widening hole he's made in the carpet. It worked! No more chewing. I guess it depends on the dog as to whether or not this product is successful for you. Worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Trissel

customer_reviews.title: Great stop chew product
customer_reviews.text: If you have a dog that scratched or chews, this is perfect! My dachshund used to chew a lot on his hind legs and up his back, one little spray he stopped chewing. Now I just show him the bottle and he stops, curls up, and gives me the snarky look. His fur is coming back and he don’t chew anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Metzger

customer_reviews.title: My Dog likes it and wants to drink it
customer_reviews.text: Not only does it not work but it makes it worse. She really likes the smell of it and wants to try and drink it and it makes her want to chew anything sprayed with it even more. A complete failure and stopping the chewing for this dog. She's a schnoodle- poodle and snauzer if that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Annalaura Brown

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Taste Buds..to like or not to like..that is the ?
customer_reviews.text: After reading many reviews on stop chewing sprays for dogs, I settled in this spray. I TRULY believe it really depends on your dogs taste as to whether or not a chewing spray will work. For our puppy (5month old pit bull) he licked the spot and started chewing again (that's what my husband said) but I have yet to see our pup go back to that spot and chew. I honestly liked that there were great reviews on this product and that it was all natural. Good luck I hope your fur baby doesn't like this spray!
customer_reviews.author: RACHAEL BAKER

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous about buying this because the reviews are so mixed but honestly I have seen a difference when I spray my sofa table and end tables. I do have to spray at least once a week but my puppy which is an Australian Shepherd has stopped chewing on the tables
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't really work...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff does smell very strongly, however, it has not been working for us. We have two puppies. When you spray this, it gets into your nose, mouth, and lungs and makes it difficult to breathe or stop coughing. Then, it needs to be re-applied almost immediately as the scent wears off VERY quickly. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa

customer_reviews.title: Didn't stop our dog from chewing our table
customer_reviews.text: Bought a brand new coffee table and sprayed all areas of the table. We went to work and came back and there was chew marks everywhere. Sprayed the table again but did a lot more. Went to work and dog chewed the table again. I do not see the product working for our dog.
customer_reviews.author: Calidjone

customer_reviews.title: Well, I tried this on myself. That's right ...
customer_reviews.text: Well, I tried this on myself. That's right, I tasted it after I sprayed a bit on my finger, and it's very, very bitter. The taste is lingering and I'm regretting it, so it's hard to imagine a pet chewing anything with this on it.
customer_reviews.author: Oobs

customer_reviews.title: Skip the pet stores!  THIS WORKS!!
customer_reviews.text: This product was fabulous! It worked exactly as described, and this was AFTER I had tried every thing at the pet stores and all “hacks” found online. After 40 years of dogs, I got an anxiety chewer. Emmy’s Best Stop and diversionary tactics have delivered a miracle!
customer_reviews.author: Lee R.

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS.  THE TASTE IS GAWDAWFUL!!️😂
customer_reviews.text: We have 6 cats and it stopped them from snacking on my houseplants. Just be sure your ceiling fan is off in fhe room you're spraying. I didn't do that, and boy does this stuff taste hateful!!️!!️ It took awhile to get the taste out of my mouth. It definitely works!!️
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P. Savage/Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Works, smells and tastes as described!
customer_reviews.text: So this stuff smells great and smart me was like, “It smells so great, there’s no way it tastes that bad.” Well, it does. It is so bitter. Exactly as advertised! Been using on my dogs leg for about a week now and she’s not biting as long as we apply it. Will get an update in a month or so to see if it has stopped her entirely.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor James Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: It works! Our dog chews everything and this was the only thing that stopped her.
customer_reviews.text: Our family loves your product. We have a labradoodle puppy and she loves to chew. Everything and anything. Including drywall. We have tried other products and she actualy thought they were condiments. Not with Emmys anti chew spray. She does not like it. We apply it to the bottom of our walls once a week and no more chewed holes. It also saved our kids plastic furniture. I was looking for a spray that will not harm our dog and will do its job and I found it in Emmys. By the way I tasted it and it seriously tastes bad. Its perfect for it job.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Cadkova

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit weary on buying this spray because of the terrible reviews. However, there isn’t much on the market and I’ve tried two different brands. I tried this last night and sure enough, my dog stayed away from it (only to find new areas to chew). Does this work? Absolutely! But your dog may find another area.
customer_reviews.author: Kellier56

customer_reviews.title: Since my 3 month old dog likes to chew everything it's PERFECT that the taste of this is so unappealing that ...
customer_reviews.text: I really was surprised this works as well as it does since I have tried similar products that didn't do what was promised. Since my 3 month old dog likes to chew everything it's PERFECT that the taste of this is so unappealing that it stops him in his tracks! Great buy! Don't second guess yourselves people. Just get it!
customer_reviews.author: Dudcoder

customer_reviews.title: Does not work.
customer_reviews.text: I sprayed this on my rescue dogs paws as he is an incessant licker when he gets nervous. He licks it off and then continues licking his paws. It didn't even slow him down. On the bright side it smells like citronella so I don't think he'll get fleas.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR $$$!
customer_reviews.text: Did nothing to deter chewing, however, the cloying stench during and after spraying, it is heavy in the air, gets into sinuses and can be tasted for hours after use-even with face covered while spraying. My Pomeranian/Chihuahua didn't mind it AT ALL. Kept right on chewing on everything.
customer_reviews.author: H.P.

customer_reviews.title: Great if used as intended
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my little one from chewing on the door frame so well that I sprayed it on my labradoodle to keep him from chewing on his ass.... it doesn't work for that at all unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Cyn

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It has been very effective. I stayed it on some wires, shoes, and other items he had been chew. He smelled most of them for a short time, but has not chewed one bit. I this it on a few other item he might want to chew. Same result. I'm extremely pleased. By the way, my do is a 6 month Pit Bull puppy.
customer_reviews.author: StewartA

customer_reviews.title: Actually works
customer_reviews.text: We have a 5 month old puppy that is teething badly. I had originally tried a different spray that he didn't even blink at. I gave this one a shot since it said 3x strength and sure enough it works. My pup even barks at the bottle because he hates it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Doughty

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for my dog
customer_reviews.text: Did not work at all or even phase my dog who bite through the harness even after dousing the harness in this. For me, it waa a waste of money. Maybe I'll use it as a prank on someone instead for April Fools. But disn nit qork for my dog
customer_reviews.author: Andy & Sammy

customer_reviews.title: My dog would drink this and it made him sick!
customer_reviews.text: My dog must be crazy, he chews on things more after I spray this! I also sprayed it on his harness and when he wakes up form naps now he can't walk right. Takes a few for him to be OK. I took the harness off of him and no issues walking.
customer_reviews.author: J. CLARK

customer_reviews.title: Works for some dogs
customer_reviews.text: Dogs stop chewing on whatever I spray this on except my stubborn male. He left it Aline until he got bored while I was at work. The other dogs aren’t the problem it was really mostly for him but I guess he might just be too stubborn.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work for all dogs!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is not effected by this spray. I have tried to reach the seller or company, however it seems to be an undivided site. So on the bottle where it indicates a free bottle - it’s impossible as there is no site available.
customer_reviews.author: Jl Syp

customer_reviews.title: Works for smaller breeds but not large breeds.
customer_reviews.text: This product unfortunately didn’t work for my big dog(Pitbull) at all. He seemed to not mind the taste and would continue to lick his healing wound. My small dog(rat terrier mix) however would not even come close to the smell of the product.
customer_reviews.author: J.T.

customer_reviews.title: Not as effective as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I sprayed this on a bandage my dog had wrapped around a wound and he still licked it away and got his bandage off. this spray was not as effective as they say it is. And I wasn't willing to taste it for myself. Sorry, not buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Graciousroz

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: It works! I tried it by spraying some product onto my dog's favorite toy. My dog wanted nothing to do with his toy until I washed it. I use it to spray the outside of the bathroom trash since my do likes to go through it. I reapply ever 3 days. You definitely have to reapply every couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Did not deter my 7 month old puppy from chewing on the fringe of my area rug! Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Texco

customer_reviews.title: We sprayed this on wood furniture that our pup kept ...
customer_reviews.text: We sprayed this on wood furniture that our pup kept chewing, while it doesn’t keep him from chewing on the furniture it does deter him when we get the bottle out and show it to him, he will walk away from whatever he is chewing on. So it doesn’t work in that you can spray it and forget it, once the smell wears off, which is rather quickly, they will go back to chewing.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great, effective and safe!
customer_reviews.text: New shelter pup was chewing older dogs dog collars, was having a hard time correcting this behavior without replacing expensive collars repeatedly. This product provided just enough humane correction when we weren't around to create an aversion. Also used on door edge that she was going for and this did the trick (along with other appropriate training). I highly recommend this product! It truly saved the day (and our budget!) Puppy doing well and all are better off for it!
customer_reviews.author: HappyInNC

customer_reviews.title: Has helped discourage power chewer
customer_reviews.text: This spray has worked great at stopping our power-chewing pitbull. She likes chewing on power cords and furniture. She will still occasionally try to chew them, but if I make sure to refresh the spray, she'll quickly leave it alone. This has worked better than any other spray I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Shananana

customer_reviews.title: He didn’t like the smell
customer_reviews.text: I used it to keep my dog away from a spot in the concrete wall where he loves to “fight” with the neighbor dog. He didn’t like the smell, and did keep his distance. Of course, he just barked at the neighbor dog a little further from the wall lol. I’m sure I’ll need to reapply every few days. I quickly glanced at the label and thought I saw that it says it can be used on wounds to deter licking? I am too lazy to double check, but there’s no way I would do that, even if it is alcohol free.
customer_reviews.author: Estefania Velasco

customer_reviews.title: She does stay away from the garbage can but it's not much of a deterrent if ...
customer_reviews.text: This worked for fabric items such as carpets but not for wood items. I sprayed it on my arm to see how she would react and she just licked it off. She does stay away from the garbage can but it's not much of a deterrent if she is determined to do something. I imagine it works well for less stubborn breeds. But not much good for Huskies.
customer_reviews.author: L. Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Great product to stop your dog biting.
customer_reviews.text: this product works great! i applied to my legs, my dog stopped biting, he licked couple of times and didnt like the taste. i use on my skin, no rush no irritation, but you must reapply couple times.
customer_reviews.author: e-nola

customer_reviews.title: It does not work! Do not buy this!
customer_reviews.text: This bitter apple does not work for our puppy. Have sprayed this item several times and it did not stop him from biting our door frame, couch, train tables, mouse and wires. I do not recommend this item at all. Waste of my money!
customer_reviews.author: belle74

customer_reviews.title: Beware following directions if you don't want your house chewed
customer_reviews.text: Be careful before following the instructions. I followed the instructions - tested on a piece of cotton soaked in the product and the pup didn't seem to like it, so I proceeded to spray the areas of concern and just leave lots of clean toys out. Should have done it the other way around - the dog seems drawn to anything sprayed and chewing has increased dramatically. The first step of the instructions should really be to spray it on one or two low value items to see how the dog reacts to them before making your whole house a target. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: jessieb19

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BREATHE IT IN
customer_reviews.text: It is very good for getting the dog not to chew the sofa, but at the same time do not spray too much because it vaporizes in the air and then it gets in your mouth. It tastes horrible and I now realize why my dog hates to chew things with it. It gets in your mouth and coats it like a Snuggie. It then makes you cough forcing you to inhale more and more. Overall just be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Alex M

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: I firmly believe this product works for some dogs. For mine, it did not. Luckily they have a money back guarantee.
customer_reviews.author: SHAWN V

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Made a Snack of the Whole Bottle
customer_reviews.text: Sprayed it accordingly, DID NOT EVEN PHASE HER She chewed the whole bottle up in 10 min, I can't leave her unsupervised for even 2 mother****** minutes!!! All she does is ruin everything!!!
customer_reviews.author: H.C.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work on my puppy
customer_reviews.text: I read all of the reviews before purchasing and thought this product would help with my crazy chewing puppy. unfortunately it did not phase him at all. The spray did nothing but give me crazy allergies (itchy throat and sneezing).
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: My Pup Doesn't Mind This
customer_reviews.text: I can't say how this product works for other puppies but mine has a very strong chewing instinct (teething) and this spray doesn't seem to deter her. I have some Bitter Apple which seems to work a bit better.
customer_reviews.author: S. King

customer_reviews.title: More problems than I had in the first place
customer_reviews.text: Might as well call it dressing for whatever it is you want to spray it on. Our dog began to gnaw on a piece of doorway trim and this stuff seemed to turn it up a notch. She full on shredded it to saw dust after her first taste of it. My wife is super mad now and won’t stop yelling at me to fix the trim. This is a problem folks, you see what you created with your trim syrup? I don’t got time for this bs you all created. It’s been two weeks she took away the booty and everything. Don’t buy this stuff guys this is no joke.
customer_reviews.author: Sofie

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: As a new puppy owner I guess I didn't think ahead and went and purchased wooden baby gates to block the area he would be in while we were at work. Didn't take long before I figured that was a dumb thing to do so I read reviews on this product and thought I would give it a try. I've been using it for a week now and have not noticed a difference. Puppy still chews on the gate, so I gave up. Went out and purchased new gates. I just don't think this product works, didn't work for my pup at least.
customer_reviews.author: Anita E

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: We have used it on our dog a few times already and it has worked. Fingers crossed
customer_reviews.author: Arica G

product_meta.title: Emmy's Best Stop The Chew 3X Strength Anti Chew Bitter Spray Deterrent for Dogs & Puppies - Alcohol Free - Most Powerful Bitter Deterrent - 8oz
feature_bullets: 3X MAX STRENGTH FORMULA - THE MOST POWERFUL BITTER DETERRENT ON THE MARKET - Our formula was developed for the specific purpose of training both puppies and adult dogs not to chew.
SIMPLE, NO MESS APPLICATION FOR EASE OF USE - Convenient spray bottle makes applying and using the deterrent a breeze. No complicated, messy steps.

INTERACTIVE 14 DAY TRAINING PROGRAM INCLUDED - Online, on your schedule. Follow our simple, easy to implement and guaranteed to work training program in conjunction with the product to gain control over chewing in 14 days.

SAFE, ALCOHOL FREE FORMULA - Our expertly engineered formula uses no alcohol, and is safe for use on chew targets including furniture, clothing, shoes, flooring, blinds, plants and more. You can even use on your dog's own fur.

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - We are so confident you'll experience the desired results with STOP The Chew that we offer an unconditional 1 year Manufacturer's Guarantee: Not happy? Return the bottle and we will refund your purchase, No questions asked!

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
